messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?
Hello! I recently received my order #W2378156, and I would like to exchange a couple of items. Could you assist me with that?

message.content: Hello! I recently received my order #W2378156, and I would like to exchange a couple of items. Could you assist me with that?

messages.content:
Sure, I can help with an exchange. I just need to locate your account first.

To authenticate, please provide one of the following:
- Your registered email address, or
- Your first name, last name, and ZIP code (in case you don’t remember the email)

Once I have that, I’ll pull up order #W2378156 and confirm:
- the items you want to exchange (item IDs)
- the new item IDs you want to replace them with (same product type)
- the payment method to handle any price difference (gift card or credit card)

Also, since this is for a delivered order, I’ll remind you that exchanges can be processed for delivered orders, and we’ll need your confirmation before proceeding. Please share the authentication detail when you’re ready.

messages.content:
I want to exchange the Mechanical Keyboard (item_id 1151293680) and the Smart Thermostat (item_id 4983901480).

For the keyboard, I want a similar one but with clicky switches. It should be full size and have RGB backlight if possible, but not white backlight. If there is no clicky switch keyboard with RGB backlight, then I would accept one without backlight.

For the thermostat, I want one compatible with Google Home instead of Apple HomeKit.

Please find the new item_ids for these replacements and let me know the options available. I would like to proceed with the exchange on this delivered order #W2378156. I prefer to use the same credit card (credit_card_9513926) for any price difference.
